item.title: Outside 42 dartmouth park road, 15th October
item.description:
See previous report from me - nothing has been done since April

item.title: This car has been reported as dumped in St John’s Park for months It has not been removed, 15th October
item.description:
This car has been left for months on end It’s MOT expires on 17 October. It is unlocked and in neglected state it occupies a parking place needed for residents etc
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 41, St John's Park, Kidbrooke, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement issue on Summer hill road near, 15th October

item.title: Abandoned Car, 15th October
item.description:
The car has been abandoned for over a year and a half and no one has come to get it. The last thing I see was last year a woman drop the car in the parking space and not seen her since

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Shore Place, Hackney, London

item.title: Green space behind 175 Seymour villas, 15th October
item.description:
This area of grass between weight on road and Seymour villas is strewn with litter and large shrubbery in middle full of fly tip rubbish This is a constant problem and the scrubbed area is always neglected by Bromley and residents would prefer it reinstated with grass and trees .we have foxes and rats nesting in there amongst the filth Also paths between houses in dire need of cleaning as they belong to Bromley and not clarion
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Weighton Road, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bollard needs repainting, 15th October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 80-86, Belgrave Road, Pimlico, London

item.title: Black VW polo, 15th October
item.description:
Hi, VW polo has been parked and not moved for weeks. Car causes problems every day near school an d OAP home. Yellow line has been painted round car. Bus,lorries and cars can't get passed and cause traffic delay. People at Zebra crossing are affected. Accident waiting happen. Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hatherley Crescent, Longlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet
